name: biblioteca-paulo-freire
description: Biblioteca Paulo Freire - Consulta de Acervo Catalogado.

scripts.css-compile: rm -rf public/css && mkdir -p public/css && node_modules/stylus/bin/stylus --sourcemap --compress stylus --out public/css --use ./node_modules/nib/lib/nib
scripts.css: npm run css-lint && npm run css-compile

author: marcker <marckfree@gmail.com> (https://github.com/marcker)
